title: Response
description: A response represents an HTTP response.

id.description: A unique, user defined identifier that can  be used to refer to this response from requests.

responseTime.title: ResponseTime
responseTime.description: The time taken by the request to complete. If a number, the unit is milliseconds. If the response is manually created, this can be set to `null`.

timings.title: Response Timings
timings.description: Set of timing information related to request and response in milliseconds

oneOf.title: Header
oneOf.description: No HTTP request is complete without its headers, and the same is true for a Postman request. This field is an array containing all the headers.

body.description: The raw text of the response.

code.description: The numerical response code, example: 200, 201, 404, etc.
